attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the number of reported rapes for women has significantly increased over the last 8 years, since 1999 as reported by Rape Crisis. The consequences of this serious and life changing (for victims) crime are not severe enough to deter offenders. We cannot let this continue, if capital punishment was reinstated for rapists we feel that it would make offenders think twice before committing the crime and therefore make the country a far safer place.
